title: GLOBEPLUS AUDIO TOOLS
description:
GLOBEPLUS AUDIO TOOLS INSTRUCTIONS
==================================



Convert between 24 audio types with ...


ffmpeg_audioconverter (8 types)
options : bitrate, samplerate and channels

sox_audioconverter (21 types)
options : samplerate, bits and channels

NoTE : 5 of the audio types can be converted in any of them
       what makes a total of 24 audio types avilable for conversion


PROCEDURE :

Copy to the audio directory any of the converters or both and the tmp folder
with the config.ini then select and run any of the converters and select
the audio type for conversion, the options and the audio type to be converted
save and close the configuration then wait for the fast conversion of the audio
files on the directory with the selected audio type for conversion


WAVDOWNXTREME


tested successfully in thousends of normal wavs 16PCM 44100Hz in hundreds of folders,convert in very fast way the normal wavs to xtreme tiny size PLAYABLE wavs
and MP3 audio can also be converted fastest as possible to the xtreme tiny size wavs 

PROCEDURE :

Copy to the normal wavs or mp3Ã‚Â´s directory the WavdownEXTREME.exe and the tmp folder and run it then 
choose the wavHz (less Hz=less size) audio gain (0=normal) and the speed (speed=1.0 normal) of the converted wavs and wait for the downsampling of the wavs 


M3UMAKER : create playlists in less than a second copying the m3UMaker executable to the converted audio directory and run it , in a second a cd.m3u is generated
drag and drop in your favourite player the m3u to start listening in sequence
all the CD songs conerted on the folder , this m3umaker can work also in any directory with high-quality audio on mp3, ogg , m4a or wav audio 

TRI~MMER : trim your audio to get ringtones to the cellphone , the options of the trimming are editable at the config.ini and they are START LENGTH , start= is thesecond that the trim start and length is the number of the seconds that the trimmed audio will have 

Examples : 

trim 0 120 will give a wav with the first 2 minutes of the trimmed audio
trim 30 120 will give a wav with 90 seconds starting at the second 30 of the trimmed audio  


NoTE :

WavHZ , audio gain and SPEED are editable at the config.ini on the tmp folder


XMPLAY : is an audio player with less than half mega that plays 14 of the possible 24 audio types available forconversion, note that some of this types like 8svx can only be played on this player,the other 10 types that doesnÃ‚Â´t play the VLC is confirmed that plays all of them, next check a list with the not playing and playing audio types on the XMPlay
